EmailTemplate.description: Notification once the Account Manager checks the checkbox specific to completion of his/her discussion with Customer and update of BX009
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009: Completion of Account Managers discussion with Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Account Manager has completed discussion with Customer for BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}'
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, Account Manager has held a discussion with {!GMPL_BX009__c.Account__c} and also updated the related BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' Please review the BX009 and update its Status to reflect the same. The BX009 can be accessed via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link}.
Thanks.
